description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a by a later hand. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Occasional staining. Origin: First half of the 19th century.
author: Kirbāsī, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm, 1766 or 1767-1844
abstract: Section of a treatise on Shiʻite law; contains Kitāb al-makāsib up to Kitāb al-mawarīth.
extent: 294 leaves : paper ; 206 x 136 (145 x 81) mm bound to 208 x 139 mm
creator: Kirbāsī, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm, 1766 or 1767-1844
كرباسي، محمد بن ابراهيم، 1766 or 1767-1844
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets; pink paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
